metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12268 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
jbig2_image_compose in jbig2_image.c in Artifex jbig2dec before 0.18 has a heap-based buffer overflow.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12268` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

jbig2dec - 0.12+20150918-1ubuntu0.1+esm2
libjbig2dec0 - 0.12+20150918-1ubuntu0.1+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jbig2dec package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.12+20150918-1ubuntu0.1+esm2').
